lx4p

Class LXPTextGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • lx4p.LXPTextGroup

  • public class LXPTextGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    LXPTextGroup is a controller for a group of LXPTextFields only a single field can have focus and receive keyPressed messages

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int fieldCount
      the number of fields in this group
      LXPTextField[] fields
      array containing the fields in this group
      int selected
      the index of the selected field or -1 if no selection

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LXPTextGroup(int size)
      construct an array to hold fields fields must be added with calls to addField

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LXPTextField addField(int xp, int yp, int s, java.lang.String t)
      add a field to the group
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
      draw the fields in this group
      LXPTextField fieldAtIndex(int index)
      get a particular text field
      LXPTextField focusField() 
      void keyPressed(processing.core.PApplet p)
      pass a keyPressed message to the text field that is selected to have focus
      boolean mousePressed()
      check to see if a field was clicked and if so, select it to have focus
      void returnInField()
      called when a field receives a return/enter key press
      void setFocusField(LXPTextField ftf)
      sets the field that has key focus
      void setFocusIndex(int index)
      sets the station with key focus -1 sets no field in focus fieldCount
      void tabInField()
      called when a field receives a tab key press

      • LXPTextGroup

        public LXPTextGroup(int size)
        construct an array to hold fields fields must be added with calls to addField

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
        draw the fields in this group
        Parameters:
        p - the Processing Applet containing the button group

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed(processing.core.PApplet p)
        pass a keyPressed message to the text field that is selected to have focus
        Parameters:
        p - the Processing Applet containing the button group

      • mousePressed

        public boolean mousePressed()
        check to see if a field was clicked and if so, select it to have focus
        Returns:
        true if station was changed

      • addField

        public LXPTextField addField(int xp,
                    int yp,
                    int s,
                    java.lang.String t)
        add a field to the group
        Parameters:
        xp - x coordinate of the field
        yp - y coordinate of the field
        s - size of field in characters
        t - title can be null
        Returns:
        the new LXPTextField

      • focusField

        public LXPTextField focusField()
        Returns:
        the focus field or null

      • fieldAtIndex

        public LXPTextField fieldAtIndex(int index)
        get a particular text field
        Parameters:
        index - of the field in the array, should be < fieldCount
        Returns:
        text field at index

      • setFocusIndex

        public void setFocusIndex(int index)
        sets the station with key focus -1 sets no field in focus fieldCount
        Parameters:
        index - zero based

      • setFocusField

        public void setFocusField(LXPTextField ftf)
        sets the field that has key focus
        Parameters:
        ftf - the field with key focus
